title: 2015–16 2. Frauen-Bundesliga
text:
The 2015–16 season of the <a href="2.%20Bundesliga%20%28women%29">2. Bundesliga (women)</a> was the twelfth season of <a href="Germany">Germany</a>'s second-tier women's <a href="Association%20football">football</a> league. This season will start on August 30, 2015.
Changes.
<a href="VfL%20Bochum">VfL Bochum</a> did not apply for this season's license due to financial problems, thus automatically relegating them back to the <a href="Regionalliga%20%28women%29">Regionalliga</a>. <a href="SV%20Henstedt-Ulzburg">SV Henstedt-Ulzburg</a> was promoted from the <a href="Regionalliga%20%28women%29">Regionalliga Nord</a> and will play in the north group. <a href="Borussia%20M%C3%B6nchengladbach%20%28women%29">Borussia Mönchengladbach</a> was promoted from the <a href="Regionalliga%20%28women%29">Regionalliga West</a>. <a href="TSV%20Schott%20Mainz">TSV Schott Mainz</a> was promoted from the <a href="Regionalliga%20%28women%29">Regionalliga Südwest</a>. <a href="Eintracht%20Wetzlar">Eintracht Wetzlar</a> was promoted from the <a href="Regionalliga%20%28women%29">Regionalliga Süd</a>. <a href="Blau-Wei%C3%9F%20Hohen%20Neuendorf">Blau-Weiß Hohen Neuendorf</a> was promoted from the <a href="Regionalliga%20%28women%29">Regionalliga Nordost</a>.
North.

South.
